attributes.action: a place for mental health patients to stay so they don't feel punished
attributes.additional_details: I want change, on the nhs people are sent to mental health hospitals where you are in confinement and stuck with all other patients. It is time to have somewhere with open space for people with depression to have therapy, walks, crafts etc

rejection.details: Neither the Government nor the Department of Health has any role in the provision of mental health services which are commissioned by the local NHS and NHS England according to local needs.
